name: RollerCoaster VRBox
description:
Don't tell me that you never thought about it...
C'mon guys... roller coasters and VR and Box?
We all know where this is going. ;)

Hello guys,

my name is Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
